page.title: 03KILCHRENAN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Kilchrenan School is over one hundred years old. It is one of the oldest buildings in the community,which is still being used. The school has only one classroom, one teacher and seven pupils. Pupils from primary one to primary seven are educated in the school. The oldest lady in Kilchrenan can remember when there were thirty five pupils but changes in employment have made many families move away from Kilchrenan and surrounding areas. The school consists of an old building, which is the classroom and a new extension with an entrance hall, storeroom and toilets. Although Kilchrenan School is small it has a computer, a television, a disc drive, a piano, a printer, a microscope, and many other educational aids.
